Description:
V. MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONSBachelor of Engineering degree in Computer or Electrical Engineering
Minimum of 10 years of experience in EPMS and SCADA engineering for high voltage substations
Experience working with the Saudi Electric supply company
Strong technical knowledge of energy management and SCADA systems
Proficiency in programming languages such as C++, Python, or Java
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously Job Details
